title: Amazon pledges up to US$50 billion to expand AI, supercomputing for U.S. government
description: Amazon.com said on Monday it would invest up to US$50 billion to expand AI and supercomputing capabilities for Amazon Web Services U.S. government customers, in one of the largest cloud infrastructure commitments targeted at the public sector.

title: Sri Lanka steps into AI future - SLASSCOM’s AI Asia Summit 2025 positions the nation as South Asia’s emerging AI innovation hub

title: PwC Faces AI Talent Shortage Despite $1B Investment
description: PwC faces a talent shortage in hiring AI experts like data scientists and engineers, despite $1 billion investments in AI for operations and client services. This reflects broader Big Four challenges amid AI-driven job automation, offshoring, and reduced entry-level roles. The firm is upskilling staff to bridge the skills gap.
